description: The Isle is an open beta with an open-world survival game where players choose from three factions in an attempt to survive a fierce island. Hunt. Prey. Survive.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# The Isle Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates wine-stable

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt

export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 412680 +quit


# Creating needed default files for the game
cd /mnt/server
echo '
-- [PLEASE NOTE]
-- The Isle does not have full support for linux server hosting, because of this reason this server will have LIMITED SUPPORT
-- any update could break the server and prevent it from running.
--
-- You can find information on The Isle server settings and config here: https://isle.fandom.com/wiki/The_Isle_Server_Settings_and_Configuration


' > readme.txt

cd TheIsle/Saved/Config/WindowsServer
echo '
[/script/theisle.igamesession]
ServerName=My Cool Server
bFamilySharing=true
bServerGlobalChat=true
bServerNameTags=true
bServerExperimental=true
ServerAIMax=300
ServerAIRate=20.0
bServerAIPlayerSpawns=true
bServerGrowth=false
bServerFallDamage=false
bServerAllowReplayRecording=true
ServerRespawnTime=0
ServerLogoutTime=0
ServerDiscord=
ServerAdmins=
BannedUsers=(UserName="",UniqueID="")

[/script/theisle.igamemode]
DisabledDinosaurs=
ProgressionOverrides=(Row="",Points=0)
ServerStartingTime=1350
bServerDynamicTimeOfDay=1
ServerDayLength=60
' > Game.ini
